4.2. MYSQL

4.2. MYSQL¶

  1. It is a data base.

  2. Login to the data base using the command

    mysql -u root -proot123

    root - is the username, -u is the flag for username. root123 - is the password, -p is the flag for the password.

  3. See the data bases in MySql

show databases; - notice the semicolon after every command.

  1. Use the myzone database for the next queries.

    use myzone;

  2. See the tables in the myzone database.

    show tables in myzone;

  3. See the categories in the table categories

    select * from categories;

  4. See the users in the table myzone_users

    select * from myzone_users

  5. See the columns in the product table

    show columns in product_detail;

  6. Count the number of rows in a table.

    select COUNT(*) from product_detail;

  7. Display the rows having ‘Watch’ in the name.

    select * from product_detail where prod_name LIKE '%Watch%' ;

  8. Display the COUNT() of the products with ELectronics

    select COUNT(*) from product_detail where prod_name LIKE '%Elec%' ;
